description: Patient medical records for healthcare operations

sample_rows.Treatment: Metformin 500mg twice daily. Dietary modification recommended. Follow-up in 3 months.
sample_rows.LabResults: HbA1c: 7.8%, Fasting glucose: 156 mg/dL, Creatinine: 1.1 mg/dL
sample_rows.Notes: Patient reports increased thirst and fatigue over past 2 months.

sample_rows.Treatment: Sertraline 100mg daily. Cognitive behavioral therapy weekly sessions.
sample_rows.Notes: Patient expressing suicidal ideation. Safety plan established. Emergency contacts updated.

sample_rows.Treatment: Tiotropium inhaler daily. Pulmonary rehabilitation program enrolled.
sample_rows.LabResults: FEV1: 58% predicted, SpO2: 93% room air, Chest X-ray: hyperinflation noted
sample_rows.Notes: Former smoker, 30 pack-year history. Oxygen therapy may be needed if SpO2 drops below 90%.

sample_rows.Treatment: Buspirone 10mg twice daily. Mindfulness-based stress reduction program.
sample_rows.LabResults: CBC: within normal limits, Cortisol: 22 mcg/dL (elevated)

sample_rows.Treatment: Amlodipine 5mg daily. Low sodium diet. Home BP monitoring.
sample_rows.LabResults: BP: 152/94 mmHg, BMP: normal, Lipid panel: LDL 145 mg/dL
sample_rows.Notes: Non-compliant with medication schedule. Discussed importance of adherence.

sample_rows.Treatment: Lumpectomy scheduled 2026-03-15. Adjuvant chemotherapy planned per oncology consult.
sample_rows.LabResults: CA 15-3: 42 U/mL (elevated), ER+/PR+/HER2-, MRI: 2.3cm mass right breast
sample_rows.Notes: Patient informed of diagnosis. Genetic counseling referral for BRCA testing. Family history positive - mother had breast cancer age 48.

sample_rows.Treatment: Referred to ophthalmology for laser photocoagulation. HbA1c target <7%.
sample_rows.LabResults: HbA1c: 8.1%, Dilated eye exam: microaneurysms and hard exudates bilateral
sample_rows.Notes: Diabetes progression despite medication. Insulin may be required. Patient resistant to injection therapy.

sample_rows.Treatment: Buprenorphine/naloxone sublingual film. Intensive outpatient program enrollment.
sample_rows.LabResults: UDS: positive opioids, Hepatitis C antibody: negative, HIV: negative
sample_rows.Notes: Court-ordered treatment. Probation officer contact: Officer Davis 555-0199.

sample_rows.Treatment: Prenatal vitamins. OB follow-up schedule established. First ultrasound scheduled.
sample_rows.LabResults: hCG: 45000 mIU/mL, Blood type: O+ Rh positive, Rubella immune, HIV negative

sample_rows.Treatment: Donepezil 10mg daily. Caregiver education provided. Memory care facility evaluation.
sample_rows.LabResults: MMSE: 18/30, MRI brain: hippocampal atrophy, cortical thinning
sample_rows.Notes: Caregiver (wife, Margaret Jenkins) reports worsening confusion and wandering behavior. Power of attorney documentation on file.
